body.name: YAKANJ End Table with LED Light,Record Player Stand with Albums Storage,Vinyl Records Storage,Turntable Stand Side Table for Music Room Studio Living Room Bedroom-White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 22 mins
features: End Table with LED Light:This is a record player stand but can work as any type of end table as well.it is perfect size for a small space,elevate your space with our end table's 20 RGB LED colors,along with dynamic modes,brightness adjustable,timing function,music modes,customize the ambiance with the remote control or App control.

Record Player Stand with Vinyls Storage:This table features 3 tiers,including a spacious tabletop suitable for various record player sizes,the 2nd and 3rd(with divider bars) open storage shelves can hold all kinds of records and media essentials,providing a categorized storage solution that combines artistry and practicality.

Two Combinations:With flexible design,the table can be customized in two different configurations for your specific room needs!it can not only serve as a record player stand,but it also doubles as a great end table or side table for small spaces.also on a side note if you don't want to install the two book divider bars on the bottom shelf you don't have to,it's optional so if you want a bigger storage space.

Sturdy and Stable:The record shelf is made of strong wooden boards,thicker irons and adjustable feet which is friendly touch,durable,sturdy and secure.the X shaped irons on the back made the end table more stable and won't wobble when placing heavy on the table.

Easy to Assemble:The record player stand with led light is extremely easy to put together,all the parts are labeled and coordinated with the instructions,the directions are simply and easy to follow,you can assemble it within 10 minutes.

Service and Support:One year quality guarantee,if you have any questions about this end table and record player stand,please feel free to contact us,our professional customer service team will get back to you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what i was looking for
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size and color. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought a small record player several years ago and really haven't had a good place to put it. I don't think the top of my dresser was intended to be a record player holder!This is absolutely perfect. I had a friend over who helped with assembly, which was a breeze. Everything came well packaged and the instructions were easy to follow.The quality of this table is very good. Once assembled, it looks great. It is the perfect record player and album holder. It's the exact perfect size for what I needed.I'm excited that my record player now has its own permanent home and I can keep my records right with it.This is a nice piece, looks nice, and is sturdy. I think it's very well made. I do recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy End-Table For Any Purpose
reviews.reviewText: I didn't use this for records, but I wanted to use this as an end-table next to a couch. The bottom rack fits books in it perfectly, and it looks great. I was able to put this together in about 30 minutes while taking my time, and I am very impressed with the sturdiness of this table. The back cross-supports add additional stability, and I think you could drive over this with a tank and it wouldn't bend.The screw-on bumpers on the bottom mean you can adjust all four legs in case there is a wobble, and this will fix that quickly with the self adjustable leg ends. Overall, perfect design and execution of a small table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sturdy table for storing vinyls
reviews.reviewText: Was easy to put together took maybe about 20 minutes. It's sturdy and has the perfect dimensions in the bottom shelf for storing vinyl records. Perfect for my living room vinyl player setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality's just not there
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble but one of the threaded nuts for the top shelf came out and had to be glued and hammered back in. Also, the led light strip had a bad connection and wouldn't operate unless it was held in place with a 3m adhesive strip so the ac adapter cable wouldn't move. I would still recommend buying, but be mindful of the problems and be gentle with the led strip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very classy and hip!
reviews.reviewText: This table is perfect and just what we needed for our record player!I will say this before going into the details: Please check the size of your record player and compare it to the measurements rather than eye ball it like we did. We almost could not use this table because the image makes it look like it is larger than it actually is, but luckily the feet of our record player fit exactly on the table top.Now that that warning is out of the way, I will say that this table is absolute perfection! The LED strip that it comes with is so cool and comes with a remote for different settings. My favorite setting is the one that flashes the lights to the beat of the music, so cool.I also love how it had the holders, which you can either have this shelf in the middle or the bottom. These little holders allow you to keep your records organized and at arms length for easy access. The table itself is very modern chic looking and it was incredibly easy to build. I would definitely recommend this to anyone trying to amplify their space!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and spacious
reviews.reviewText: I am thrilled with this sturdy nightstand table! Its durability is exceptional, providing a reliable surface for my nighttime essentials. Plus, its sleek design complements any bedroom decor seamlessly. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for what I need it for
reviews.reviewText: I do not need this for records. I got this to help organize some of my craft stuff and this is perfect size. It was quite simple to put together, but there are a lot of different hardware pieces, which makes it kind of a pain to deal with. I like when Furniture only requires a couple different types of hardware. There was really no need for all the different types to be included. Otherwise it’s great adjustable feet in case your floor is not level.
